name: Dotmination
description:
A joyfully colourful puzzle game where you win by overtaking the entire field creating chain-reactions. Featuring two modes: one to progress level by level and a "Random mode" which generates an infinite amount of challenges.

The "Level mode" can get your heart pumping, stimulating you to outsmart your opponent as quickly as possible. Be aware that the game can turn the odds at any time, try to keep your focus!

For different colours, simply shake your phone (or click the bot icon). The game also works great with Dark-mode.

More improvements are coming. Please share your feedback!
